title: General Manager, Hotel Operations Job at Alan & Grant
content:
Alan & Grant - Our client is a hospitality conglomerate based in Nigeria with diverse business interests including restaurants, catering, snack food manufacturing, hotels, cinemas, and real estate development.

They are recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager, Hotel Operations

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The General Manager is responsible for the overall strategic direction, operational efficiency, guest satisfaction, and financial performance of the hotel.
	This leadership role ensures that all departments operate in alignment with the brand’s standards, while also driving profitability, maintaining service excellence, and fostering a high-performance culture among staff.


Key Responsibilities 


	Ensure high-quality customer service and guest satisfaction.
	Implement strategies to enhance the guest experience, including personalized services.
	Monitor online reviews and guest feedback to drive continuous improvement.
	Supervise daily hotel operations, including front desk, housekeeping, food & beverage, and maintenance.
	Work with the revenue management team to optimize room rates and occupancy.
	Monitor operational expenses and manage budgets effectively.
	Assist in cost control initiatives without compromising service quality.
	Ensure smooth check-in/check-out procedures and efficient room turnovers.
	Monitor inventory levels and coordinate procurement for hotel supplies.
	Enforce health, safety, and sanitation regulations.
	Support sales and marketing efforts to boost bookings and revenue.
	Supervise and provide guidance to department heads and staff.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	7-10 years in hotel operations, with managerial experience.
	Strong leadership, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple responsibilities.
	Knowledge of financial planning, budgeting, and revenue management

title: Social Media Officer Job at Aspom Travels and Tours
content:
Aspom Travels and Tours is a travel company that offers a wide range of services to facilitate both individual and corporate travel plans. Our services include Visa assistance, Flight reservations, Hotel bookings, Birth services and Planning different tour packages to suit the needs and preferences of our customers. Our agency is committed to providing efficient and high-quality services atcompetitive rates.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Social Media Officer is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the company's social media strategy to enhance brand awareness, engagement, and drive relevant traffic.
	This role involves creating compelling content, managing social media platforms, analyzing performance metrics, and staying up-to-date with the latest social media trends.
	The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, possesses excellent communication skills, and has a proven track record of successful social media management.


Responsibilities


	Develop and execute social media strategies aligned with marketing goals.
	Create engaging and relevant content (text, images, videos) for various social media platforms.
	Manage and maintain the company's social media presence across all relevant channels.
	Monitor social media trends, tools, and applications, and implement best practices.
	Identify and engage with influencers and key stakeholders.
	Stay up-to-date on social media algorithm changes and adapt strategies accordingly.
	Engage with the online community, respond to inquiries, and foster positive interactions.
	Track and analyze social media performance metrics to optimize campaigns and strategies.
	Collaborate with marketing and other teams to ensure brand consistency and integrated campaigns.
	Manage social media budgets and ensure cost-effectiveness.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Marketing, or a related field.
	1 - 3 years of proven experience in social media management, content creation, and community engagement.
	Strong understanding of various social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok).
	Excellent writing, editing, and visual communication skills.
	Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics platforms.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret data and generate insights.
	Creative and innovative thinker with a passion for social media trends.


Salary
N150,000 / Month.

title: Travel Consultant Job at Aspom Travel Agency
content:
Aspom Travel Agency was founded on the 2nd of February, 2012 and has remained at the top of its game providing visa assistants, hotels, holiday packages, tours and flight deals to her clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Travel Consultant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Travel Consultant is responsible for assisting clients with travel arrangements including flight bookings, hotel reservations, visa processing, travel insurance, tour packages, and related services.
	The role involves providing expert advice, handling client inquiries, offering tailored travel solutions, and ensuring an excellent customer experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Consult with clients to determine their travel needs, preferences, and budget.
	Book flights, hotels, cruises, and other travel-related services.
	Offer travel packages and promotions to potential and existing clients.
	Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and emergencies professionally.
	Follow up with clients before and after their trips to ensure satisfaction.
	Assist with visa applications, travel insurance, and itinerary planning.
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of travel industry trends, destinations, and requirements.
	Process payments, issue travel documents, and maintain accurate client records.
	Liaise with airlines, hotels, tour operators, and other partners.
	Meet sales targets and contribute to the agency's growth.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree in Tourism, Hospitality, Business Administration, or any related field.
	1–3 years of experience in a travel agency or similar role.
	Familiarity with international travel procedures, visa processes, and destination knowledge is highly desirable.
	Experience using booking platforms and travel software is a plus.


Other Requirements:


	Must have a passion for travel and tourism.
	Flexible working hours, including weekends or evenings, depending on client needs.
	Team player with a positive attitude.
	Integrity and discretion when dealing with confidential information.


Required Skills:


	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong customer service orientation.
	Attention to detail and organizational ability.
	Knowledge of GDS (e.g., Amadeus, Sabre, Galileo) is an advantage.
	Good problem-solving and negotiation skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and multitask.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).


Remuneration


	Competitive salary (N150,000 Monthly)  based on experience and qualifications.
	Commission on sales or closed bookings.
	Performance-based bonuses.
	Travel discounts or fam trips (familiarization trips) where applicable.
	Professional development opportunities.
